import React from 'react' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const Country = () => { const [continents, setContinents] = useState([]); const [continent, setContinent] = useState('worldwide'); const [continentInfo, setContinentInfo] = useState({}) useEffect (()=>{ const getData = async () =>{ await fetch('https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/continents') .then(res=>res.json()) .then( data => { const continents = data.map(item=>( { name : item.continent, value: item.continentInfo } )) setContinents(continents) }) } getData() },[]) useEffect(() => { fetch("https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/all") .then(res=>res.json()) .then(data => setContinentInfo(data)) }, []) const onContinentChange = async e =>{ const url = e.target.value == 'worldwide' ? `https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/all` : `https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/continents/${e.target.value}` await fetch(url) .then(res=>res.json()) .then(data=>{ setContinent(e.target.value); setContinentInfo(data) }) } return ( <>

Select continent
